reviewText: If you like volleyball you will like this. its a great trip down memory lane, or to review your history if you are young or new to the game. Stop complaining that you can't tip or set the serves indoor newbs!

What a load of garbage! The sound quality on this is pathetic - half the time you can't even hear what the players who are being interviewed are saying because of crowd noise from the previous scene carrying over. The vision is OK, some good highlights, but the whole thing just seems to meander aimlessly without any theme holding it together. Sometimes it looks like we're following the tour, other times it looks like we're doing a player focus.
